mapper.select: SELECT SERV_ID,NUM FROM ( SELECT SERV_ID,ROWNUM AS NUM FROM CRD_SERV_APP WHERE SERV_ID LIKE #{idPrefix} ||'%' ORDER BY SERV_ID DESC ) A WHERE A.NUM = 1
SELECT PREP_CODE FROM CRD_SERV_PREF_STYLE WHERE SERV_ID = #{servId} ORDER BY PREP_SEQ ASC
SELECT ADD_CODE FROM CRD_SERV_ADD_ORDER WHERE SERV_ID = #{servId} ORDER BY ADD_SEQ ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CRD_SERV_APP APP,CRD_SERV_SUGG SUGG WHERE APP.SERV_ID = SUGG.SERV_ID AND CUSTOMER_ID = #{memId} AND PROGRESS_CODE = 'STU0030001' AND CHOOSE_YN = 'Y'

SELECT SERV_ID,SUGG_ID,SERV_DATE,SERV_DAY,APP_DATE,PROGRESS_CODE, CHOOSE_DATE, PER_BUD, PARTICIPANT,COMPANY_NAME FROM ( SELECT A.*,ROWNUM AS NUM FROM ( SELECT APP.SERV_ID ,SUGG_ID ,TO_CHAR(APP.SERV_DATE ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS SERV_DATE ,TO_CHAR(APP.SERV_DATE ,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS SERV_DAY ,TO_CHAR(APP.APP_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS APP_DATE ,PROGRESS_CODE ,TO_CHAR(CHOOSE_DATE ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS CHOOSE_DATE ,SUGG.PER_BUD ,PARTICIPANT ,(SELECT NAME FROM CRD_COMPANY WHERE MEM_ID = SUGG.MEM_ID) AS COMPANY_NAME FROM CRD_SERV_APP APP,CRD_SERV_SUGG SUGG WHERE APP.SERV_ID = SUGG.SERV_ID AND CUSTOMER_ID = #{memId} AND PROGRESS_CODE = 'STU0030001' AND CHOOSE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY SERV_DATE ASC ) A )WHERE NUM BETWEEN #{startNum} AND #{endNum}
